      • initPrinter

        public void initPrinter()
        Start the printing process.

        The Controller will request the receipt data by triggering onPrintDataRequested when it is ready to print. When the printing is completed, the callbacks onPrinterStatus will be triggered.

        Callback:
        PrinterController.PrinterDelegate.onPrintDataRequested()

      • initPrinter

        public void initPrinter(byte[] config)
        Start the printing process.

        The Controller will request the receipt data by triggering onPrintDataRequested when it is ready to print. When the printing is completed, the callbacks onPrinterStatus will be triggered.

        Parameters:
        config - config byte array data;
        when config is null, default config is used;
        when config has data, the byte length is 6, the byte arrangement is
        1| power in strobe width adjustment, 0-20 |
        2| usb, battery mode strobe width adjustment, 0-20 |
        3| strobe width contrast for unit powered by Power Adaptor, 0-4 |
        4| strobe width contrast for unit powered by USB Charger, Battery, 0-4 |
        5| dot mode byte 0 |
        6| dot mode byte 1 |
        for half-dot mode: 0x00 | 0x05
        for full-dot mode: 0x00 | 0x06

      • sendPrinterData

        public void sendPrinterData(byte[] data)
        Send print data to Controller.

        Callback:
        PrinterController.PrinterDelegate.onPrinterStatus(PrinterController.PrintStatus)

        Parameters:
        data - A byte array of the print data.
